_💡 Verification agent_

<details>
<summary>🧩 Analysis chain</summary>

**Double-check the new blog URL**

The added link follows the historical `/blog/post/...` pattern, but Appwrite sometimes uses `/blog/...` without the `post/` segment. Please verify that `https://appwrite.io/blog/post/announcing-bulk-api` resolves correctly (HTTP 200) and isn’t redirected to a different slug to avoid future 404s.

---

🏁 Script executed:

```shell
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# Verify that the new Bulk API blog post URL is reachable
curl -Is https://appwrite.io/blog/post/announcing-bulk-api | head -n 1
```

Length of output: 84

---

🏁 Script executed:

```shell
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# Verify alternative Bulk API blog post URL without the 'post/' segment
curl -Is https://appwrite.io/blog/announcing-bulk-api | head -n 1
```

🏁 Script executed:

```shell
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# Fetch blog index and look for Bulk API post links
curl -s https://appwrite.io/blog | grep -i bulk | sed -n 's/.*href="\([^"]*\)".*/\1/p'
```

</details>
